Description.Text:
Position The hotel is situated just 80 meters from the sea in a quiet location and is managed by the owners, guarantee of hospitality and kindness, which is typical of the people of Abruzzo.
Restaurant The full board start with lunch at the day of arrival and ends with breakfast on departure day.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations BluRelda Hotel Restaurant with a large lobby, bar, TV room and reading room, elevator, garden and private beach is only available to customers staying. Treatment ALL INCLUSIVE includes: continental breakfast buffet, water and local wine during meals, salad buffet, air conditioning in room, use of bicycles subject to availability (free for the first 1/2 hour), 1 gastro evening per week, fantasy aperitif with buffet every Sunday. TESSESA CLUB: compulsory from 29/6 to 31/8 includes: animation (from 29/6 to 31/8), mini and junior club, beach service (1 sun umbrella, 1 deckchair from the 3rd row, 1 sun bed, use cabins) , table tennis, darts, dance lessons and sports, water aerobics, muscle toning.
